## aads keywords list

List targeting keywords in an ad group

```
aads keywords list [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --adgroup-id int    Ad group ID
      --all               Fetch all pages
      --campaign-id int   Campaign ID
  -h, --help              help for list
      --limit int         Max results
      --offset int        Start offset
```
